metadata.description: A terrible waking dream. The fragile world is shattered. An hourglass and time that cannot be returned, corrected or rewritten.  Every grain of sand becomes part of eternity, history.  Nostalgia for a country that no longer exists.  Irretrievably lost home for many people.  A grief that cannot be measured for others.  Rocket attacks on civilians, propaganda, terrorizing independent media and the opposition. Orwell's revived novel. The nuclear threat.
